description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are to: (i.) strengthen COLCIENCIAS’ ability to promote human capital for the knowledge economy, R&Dand innovation; and (ii) raise awareness of science, technology, and innovation in Colombian society.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 B.1 and B.2 | Description :Borrower shall make the proceeds of the Loan available to COLCIENCIASthrough budgetary transfers and make budgetary provisions in COLCIENCIAS annual budgets for CY 2011...equivalent to 75%.... |Frequency :Yearly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 B.3(a) and B.3(b) | Description :The Borrower, through COLCIENCIAS, shall: (a) adopt and thereafterapply and cause to be applied in the carrying out of the Project the Project Operational Manual under terms and conditions.... |Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 B.3(e) | Description :The Borrower, through COLCIENCIAS, and COLCIENCIAS shall undertake that nophysical or economic involuntary displacement of people (as interpreted in accordance with the Bank's Operational Pol... |Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 B.5 | Description :The Borrower, through COLCIENCIAS, shall finance Sub-projects under Parts B, C andD of the Project on a grant basis (the Grant) to Beneficiaries pursuant to the provisions established in the.... | Frequency:Monthly

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2 B.6 | Description :In the event that the Grants are provided to Beneficiaries through a FinancialInstitution on behalf of COLCIENCIAS, the Borrower,through COLCIENCIAS, shall: (a) comply and cause the .... | Frequency :Monthly

Finance Agreement :Schedulue 2 A.1 | Description :The Borrower shall maintain, at all times, during the implementation of theProject, COLCIENCIAS as its Departamento Administrativoresponsible for the effective technical, fiduciary and sup.. | Frequency:Monthly

title.narrative: Percentage of COLCIENCIAS annual investment budget committed by the end of the second quarterof the calendar year
Revised COLCIENCIAS' convocatoria processes, from call-for-proposals to subproject monitoring, developed and approved by COLCIENCIAS Board of Directors
Number of evaluations for the convocatorias corresponding to the R&D and innovation pilots (innovation management, priority areas,and open innovation) completed
Number of evaluations for the convocatorias corresponding to the labor insertion and diaspora pilots completed
Number of management units using the Balanced Scorecard
Number of proposals financed for innovation-management capacity building subprojects
Total number of students covered yearly by Ondas program (cumulative from 2011 to 2013)
Number of citizens participating in citizen participation activities financed by the Projects (excluding Ondas and mass media)
Number of doctoral graduates participating in the labor insertion programs financed by COLCIENCIAS under the Project (cumulative)
Number of subprojects involving researchers residing abroad participating in collaborative research projects.
Number of research, policy and/or technical papers completed by the internal policy analysis unit
Monitoring and evaluation framework for social dissemination of STI established
Monitoring and evaluation framework for Ondas established
Development of social innovation policy document
Number of new ideas or innovations developed by labor insertion, diaspora research, innovation management, open innovation and priority area program activities.
Annual number of unique visitors of the COLCIENCIAS website
Number of R&D and innovation subprojects in priority areas (biofuels and renewable energy).
Number of beneficiaries who have completed short course(s).
Total number of staff trained according to an adopted competencies model
Percent of population that agrees that Colombia creates Technology.
Percent of population that agrees that Colombia creates Science
